Harman's North Fork Cottages in Cabins West Virginia

Located near the source of the Potomac River in West Virginia, Harman's North Fork Cottages provides the ultimate in rustic Glamping. Modern log homes with up-to-date amenities, gas fireplaces, hot tubs on outside decks, floor-to-ceiling windows, fully-appointed kitchens and WiFi welcome you to the wild and wonderful nature of West Virginia's river valleys running through the rock formations and mountain ridges. Nearby include Spruce Knob, Dolly Sods, Seneca Rocks, Big Bend and many other places to enjoy nature.

Cabins Info

Cabins Have

  1. bed linens
  2. towels for indoor use
  3. WiFi
  4. Fully appointed kitchens
  5. washer/dryers
  6. hot tubs
  7. dish washing soap
  8. laundry soap
  9. paper towels
  10. sponges
  11. trash bags
  12. hand soap

Check-out

  1. Put all trash in the bins outside
  2. Put all linens in washing machine/bathtub
  3. Leave key on table
  4. Take all food/drinks
  5. Check for lost items
  6. Turn hot tubs down to 90
  7. Checkout is at 11am prompt

What to Bring

  1. BYOB - or whatever you like to drink
  2. Towels for outside
  3. Flashlight
  4. River shoes and swimsuits
  5. extra snacks
  6. Sunscreen and bug spray
  7. Any musical instrument
  8. camp chair

Directions

The cabins are a couple of miles past Smoke Hole Caverns on Rt. 55 on the left hand side. The right turn for Dolly Sods (marked with a sign) is 200 yards before the left turn into the cabins.
